mapper.update: UPDATE Discussion SET discussion = #{discussion}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Discussion (masterpieceId, memberId, discussion) VALUES (#{masterpieceId}, #{memberId}, #{discussion})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.masterpieceId, d.memberId, d.discussion, d.inserted, d.updated, m.nickName FROM Discussion d JOIN Member m ON d.memberId = m.id WHERE d.masterpieceId = #{masterpieceId} ORDER BY d.id DESC
